definition: World Health Organization (WHO)/abbr. for 世界衛生組織|世界卫生组织[Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Zu3 zhi1]
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
World Health Organization (WHO)/abbr. for 世界衛生組織|世界卫生组织[Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Zu3 zhi1]

sentences.english: Where can I find job opportunities at WHO?
sentences.chinese: 何處可查閱世衛組織的工作機會？

sentences.english: WHO is deeply concerned about the cholera outbreak in Haiti.
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織深切關注海地的霍亂疫情。

sentences.english: The work of WHO is relevant in every country, benefits every country.
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織的工作涉及每個國家，也造福每個國家。

sentences.english: WHO is the Secretariat for the International Coordinating Group for Yellow Fever Vaccine Provision (ICG).
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織擔當黃熱病疫苗供應國際協調小組的祕書處。

sentences.english: WHO will run this platform in English.
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織將以英文運行這一平臺。

sentences.english: These consequences have also affected the financing of WHO at every level.
sentences.chinese: 這些後果也影響到世衛組織各級的資金供應。

sentences.english: She predicts the World Health Organization will soon raise the alert level to phase six, an official pandemic.
sentences.chinese: 她預測世衛組織很快會將警戒級別調至6級。

sentences.english: WHO's estimated financial requirement is a total of US$ 12.3 million.
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織估計的資金需求總數爲1230萬美元。

sentences.english: Some officials within WHO believe, however, that this will not be enough.
sentences.chinese: 然而，世衛組織有些官員認爲這些還不夠。

sentences.english: This will be the first report for WHO of this nature ever commissioned by Member States.
sentences.chinese: 這將是會員國委託的第一份此類性質的世衛組織報告。

sentences.english: They need their governments to implement the WHO Framework Convention.
sentences.chinese: 他們還需要其政府實施世衛組織框架公約。

sentences.english: Journalists will have a working space in the WHO Library.
sentences.chinese: 記者將在世衛組織圖書館有一個工作區。

sentences.english: How and why does this differ from the advice from the WHO?
sentences.chinese: 這項研究如何以及爲什麼與世衛組織的建議不同？

sentences.english: Excellent collaboration between the Ministry of Health and the WHO team continues.
sentences.chinese: 衛生部與世衛組織小組之間繼續極好的合作。

sentences.english: WHO put its authority behind the use of DDT for indoor residual spraying.
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織支持使用滴滴涕進行室內殘留噴灑。

sentences.english: At the same time, WHO issued information on its public web site.
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織同時還在其公開網站上發佈信息。

definition: World Health Organization (WHO)/abbr. for 世界衛生組織|世界卫生组织[Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Zu3 zhi1]
health bureau (or office, or department, or agency)
Saudi Arabia (Tw), abbr. for 沙烏地阿拉伯王國|沙乌地阿拉伯王国
Chen Chien-jen (1951-), Taiwanese politician, vice president of the Republic of China 2016-2020

pinyin: guo2 ji4 dian4 xin4 lian2 meng2
Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Da4 hui4
Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: Frank Chang-ting Hsieh (1946-), Taiwanese DPP politician, mayor of Kaohsiung 1998-2005

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Hong2 Shi2 zi4 hui4

definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
